paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the association of mitochondrial haplogroups with breast cancer risk in BRCA2 mutation carriers, identifying one specific variant (G13708A/rs28359178) associated with familial breast cancer risk.

functional_data.summary: The variant G13708A/rs28359178 has demonstrated an inverse association with familial breast cancer risk.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is associated with familial breast cancer risk.
variants.additional_notes: The study highlights the potential role of mitochondrial haplogroups in modifying breast cancer risk in BRCA2 mutation carriers.
key_quotes: We also identified three potential susceptibility loci, including G13708A/rs28359178, which has demonstrated an inverse association with familial breast cancer risk.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in BRCA2 was identified in the paper.
